content: 3 baby lace edgings you can use any yarn or thread to work these patterns the hook should correspond to yarn size pictured with size 10 thread and a size 6 steel hook large loop baby edging directions *chain 7 double_crochet in 7th chain from hook* chain seven and double_crochet in the 7th chain from hook not the same space as the last time continue in this manner till you get to the desired length of chain *=repeat from here to here small loop baby edging pattern *chain 5 single_crochet in 5th chain from hook* chain five and single_crochet in the 5th chain from hook not the same space as the last time continue in this manner till you get to the desired length of chain *=repeat from here to here clover baby edging pattern first motif *chain 5 single_crochet in 5th chain from hook * repeat two more times 3 picots made slip_stitch into the first of the three picots where you did the first single_crochet rest of the motifs *chain 10 single_crochet in the 5th chain from chain 5 single_crochet in the 5th chain from hook 2x* repeat from star to star to desired length
